Installation¶

Installing ttkbootstrap is easy. There are a few ways to install ttkbootstrap.

PyPI¶

Installing from PyPI is the easiest method, and recommended as it will contain the most up-to-date stable distribution of ttkbootstrap:

python -m pip install ttkbootstrap

This also installs pillow as a required dependency if it is not already installed. This library is used to handle some of the image processing used in ttkbootstrap.

Source¶

You may also install using git for the latest features.

python -m pip install git+https://github.com/israel-dryer/ttkbootstrap

Note

While installing from Source will give you the most up-to-date features of ttkbootstrap, it’s also more likely to include developing and untested changes.

ttkbootstrap
